name: Leading Design Hiring Talk
description:
This is a talk I gave for the 2021 Leading Design Festival about recruiting and hiring design teams.


The official talk recording won't surface for another few months, but in the mean time here's a loom recording of it.


Shoutouts to Joel Califa for his inspiration on our initial methodology, Nairi Yuhki and Nadia for their support in revising and editing this talk, and to the crew at ClearLeft for putting on this remote conference!
